Title: Provides for release of subcontractor's retainage held by a public owner or contractor sixty days after substantial completion of work
Summary: Provides for release of subcontractor's retainage held by a public owner or contractor sixty days after substantial completion of work.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the general municipal law, in relation to release of subcontractor's retainage
